_sText:
Just as the name shows up, its a remake FROM ZERO, taken by the dimensions of the old inferno versions between counter-strike old versions, it brings some nostalgic thoughts of the old one, all the remakes i seen wasnt good enoguh for me, so i remaked it, this map is older than the one released by cspro-mod but i never released here,so i hope you enjoy it.

Note: I did not do this map for pro mod, neither i work for them.
